tuv.seg: Where to complain about medical professionals
Cén áit le gearán a dhéanamh faoi Dhaoine Gairmiúla Leighis
The following are statutory regulatory bodies for the health and social care professions in Ireland
Is iad seo a leanas na comhlachtaí rialaithe reachtúla do lucht gairmiúil leighis in Éirinn
In general, they promote high standards of professional conduct, maintain a register of qualified personnel and investigate allegations of professional misconduct or fitness to practice

Go ginearálta, cuireann siad chun cinn ardchaighdeáin d’iompar gairmiúil, cothabhálann siad clár de phearsanra cáilithe agus déanann siad fiosrúchán ar mhí-iompar gairmiúil nó ar chumas i gcóir leigheas a chleachtadh
They usually have a Fitness to Practise or similar committee
Go hiondúil, bíonn coiste do Chumas i gCóir Leighis a Chleachtadh acu nó coiste dá leithéid
This committee deals with complaints into the conduct of a registered practitioner
Déileálann an coiste seo le gearáin maidir le hiompar chleachtóirí cláraithe
The complaint may be on the grounds of professional misconduct and/or fitness to engage in the practice by reason of physical or mental disability
D’fhéadfadh an gearán a bheith faoi mhí-iompar gairmiúil agus/ nó faoi chumas le cleachtadh a dhéanamh mar gheall ar mhíchumas fisiciúil nó meabhrach
The Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 provided for a system of statutory registration for certain health and social care professions
Chuir an tAcht um Ghairmithe Sláinte agus Cúraim Shóisialaigh córas um chlárú reachtúil ar fáil do dhá ghairm bheatha déag sláinte agus cúraim shóisialaigh
• Optometrists and dispensing opticians
• Radharceolaithe agus radharceolaithe oftalmacha
• Speech and language therapists
• Teiripeoirí urlabhra agus teanga
The Health and Social Care Professionals Council (CORU) was established in March 2007
Bunaíodh an Chomhairle um Ghairmithe Sláinte agus Cúraim Shóisialaigh (CORU) i mí an Mhárta 2007
It is in the process of establishing a Registration Board for each of these professions, as well as a committee structure to deal with complaints made against registered professionals
Tá Bord Clárúcháin á bhunú aici do gach ceann de na gairmeacha beatha seo, chomh maith le struchtúr coiste chun déileáil le gearáin a dhéantar in aghaidh gairmithe cláraithe
You can read more about the registration of social and health care professionals here
Is féidir leat tuilleadh a léamh faoi chlárú na ngairmithe cúraim shóisialaigh agus sláinte anseo
In this document we give the regulatory bodies for the major health and social care professions
Anseo, tugann muid na comhlachtaí rialaithe do na príomh-ghairmeacha leighis
You can read more about other health service agencies here
Is féidir leat tuilleadh a léamh faoi ghníomhaireachtaí seirbhíse sláinte eile anseo
The Medical Council protects the interests of the public when dealing with registered medical practitioners
Cosnaíonn an Chomhairle Leighis leasanna an phobail agus iad ag déileáil le cleachtóirí leighis cláraithe
Information on making a complaint is available on the Council's website
Tá faisnéis maidir le gearán a dhéanamh ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin na Comhairle
The Dental Council is a statutory body which provides for the registration of dentists
Is comhlacht reachtúil é an Chomhairle Fiaclóireachta a dhéanann clárú ar fhiaclóirí
The Council can inquire into a registered dentist’s fitness to practise dentistry
Is féidir leis an gComhairle ceist a chur faoi chumas an fhiaclóra chláraithe chun fiaclóireacht a chleachtadh
An Bord Altranais (The Nursing Board) is the statutory body which provides for the registration, control and education of nurses and for other matters relating to nurses and the practice of nursing
Is comhlacht reachtúil é an Bord Altranais a chumasaíonn clárú, rialú agus oideachas na n-altraí agus cúrsaí nach iad a bhaineann le banaltraí agus cleachtadh an altranais
The Pharmaceutical Society of Ireland (PSI) is a statutory body, established under the Pharmacy Act 2007 as the pharmacy regulator
Is comhlacht reachtúil é Cumann Cógaiseoirí na hÉireann (CCÉ) a bunaíodh faoin Acht Cógaisíochta 2007 mar an rialálaí cógaisíochta
It is charged with regulating the practice and profession of pharmacy
Tá sé mar chúram aige cleachtais agus gairm na cógaisíochta a rialáil
All pharmacies and pharmacists must be registered with it
Caithfidh gach cógaslann a bheith cláraithe leis
Their goal is the promotion of patient safety and public health, and its primary responsibility is to the general public
Is í aidhm an Chumainn ná sábháilteacht na n-othar agus sláinte phoiblí a chur chun cinn, agus tá sé freagrach go príomhúil don phobal i gcoitinne
The Veterinary Council of Ireland was established under the Veterinary Practice Act 2005
Bunaíodh Comhairle Tréidlianna na hÉireann faoin Acht um Chleachtadh Tréidliachta 2005
The main function of the Council is to regulate the practice of veterinary medicine and nursing in the public interest
Is í príomhaidhm na Comhairle ná cleachtadh an leighis agus an altranais tréidliachta a rialáil chun leasa an phobail
Information on making a complaint is available on the Council's website
Tá faisnéis maidir le gearán a dhéanamh ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin na Comhairle

Complementary and alternative healthcare practitioners are professionals who use acupuncture, herbs, homeopathy, therapeutic massage, oriental medicine or other methods to promote well being or treat health conditions

Gairmithe iad cleachtóirí comhlántacha agus malartacha cúram sláinte a úsáideann snáthaidpholladh, luibheanna, hoiméapaite, suathaireacht theiripeach, cógas oirthearach nó modhanna eile chun folláine a chur chun cinn nó chun cóireáil a chur ar riochtaí sláinte
There are no statutory registration requirements for the practitioners of complementary therapies currently
Níl aon riachtanais clárúcháin reachtúla do cheachtaitheoirí leigheas comhlántach in Éirinn faoi láthair

While they are not subject to statutory professional regulation, they are subject to legislation, similar to other practitioners, including consumer protection, health and safety, competition, contract and criminal law

Cé nach mbíonn na cleachtóirí faoi réir rialáil ghairmiúil reachtúil, bíonn siad faoi réir reachtaíochta, ar nós cleachtóirí eile, an dlí cosanta tomhaltóirí, sláinte agus sábháilteachta, iomaíochais, conartha agus coiriúil ina measc
If you have a complaint against a medical professional, you can bring it to the attention of the relevant professional organisation
Má tá gearán agat i gcoinne duine gairmiúil leighis, is féidir leat é a chur faoi bhráid na heagraíochta gairmiúla cuí
There is information on making a complaint about health and social care services at healthcomplaints.ie
Tá eolas maidir le gearán a dhéanamh maidir le seirbhísí sláinte agus cúraim shóisialta ag healthcomplaints.ie
You can read general guidelines on making a complaint here
Is féidir treoirlínte a léamh faoi ghearán a dhéanamh anseo
